actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish the John Day Fossil Beds National Monument in the State of Oregon, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish the John Day Fossil Beds National Monument in the State of Oregon. Requires the Secretary to designate appropriate landmarks, such as a visitors' information center, within the monument area in recognition of the work of Thomas Condon. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish the John Day Fossil Beds National Monument in the State of Oregon, and for other purposes.
